duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop the partnership strategy and execute towards its goals for Salesforce and critical partnerships.
Engage directly with strategic customers, partners, and internal stakeholders as a primary point of contact on partnerships.
Coordinate the launch of integrations or joint solutions with Salesforce and other partners.
Coordinate joint presence at key events and related industry events with Salesforce and other partners.
Collaborate with Marketing and Sales teams to build joint go-to-market plans, marketing engines, and sales strategy materials.
Drive sales enablement efforts around joint solutions across the global Snowflake sales organization.
Develop joint sales plays that effectively position Salesforce and other partners in conjunction with the core benefits of Snowflake.

education_certification.credential: Minimum 7 years of relevant sales, business development, or alliances experience. MBA or advanced degree is a plus.
